results.title: Making the Songs Pop in ‘Bad Hair’
results.abstract: Justin Simien, the writer and director of the 1989-set horror-comedy, also wrote some of the retro-sounding songs. Though he’s known for “Dear White People,” music has long been a hobby.

results.title: How New York’s Small Cinemas Are Hanging On
results.abstract: Despite the continued shutdown of the city’s movie houses, indie theaters just may survive: They are less reliant on Hollywood and have a loyal audience.

results.title: James Redford, Documentarian and Environmentalist, Dies at 58
results.abstract: After two liver transplants, he founded an institute to increase awareness. He and his father, Robert Redford, also championed environmental films.
